description: Attach a volume to a host or host group.

host_group_id.description: Unique identifier of the host group to be attached to the volume. Only one of host_id or host_group_id can be supplied.

host_id.description: Unique identifier of the host to be attached to the volume. Only one of host_id or host_group_id can be supplied.

id.description: Unique identifier of volume to attach.

logical_unit_number.description: Logical unit number for the host volume access.
